# KEGGerator

<!-- badges: start -->
![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)
![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/tbradley1013/KEGGerator)

<!-- badges: end -->

<p style="color=red;font-size=5em;"><b>KEGGerator is currently unstable and under active development</b></p>

The goal of KEGGerator is to identify the functionality of 16S rRNA microbial community data. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tbradley1013/KEGGerator")
```
